The Monstrosity can be healed by Carapace and has the ability to Burrow to a visible location every <c val="#TooltipNumbers">80</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows Abathur to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits.  This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on his Monstrosity.
